channel.title: Midi in from specific device only
channel.description:
Is there a way to get midi in data (cc in my case) from a selected device only?
Some of the midi/out objects let you choose between din/usb host port/internal port... I am basically looking for the same for a midi/in object.
I probably just need to know if that's possible, and what the midi code for that would look like. But specifically, I would like to get cc data that come from a non-internal port only.
Thanks in advance, and happy 2019, all!

item.title: Midi in from specific device only
item.dc:creator: @jaffasplaffa Mr. Grimm
item.description:
@jaffasplaffa wrote:

Oh and if you also need to set port and midi device, you need to tick of the "has midi selector" and refresh the patcher object and then you can set those too:

Screen Shot 2019-01-04 at 07.49.47.png1132x561 47.7 KB

Read full topic
item.source: Midi in from specific device only

item.title: Midi in from specific device only
item.dc:creator: @Captain_Burek Daniel Büring
item.description:
@Captain_Burek wrote:

Wow! Prize for the quickest reply ever! (Please tell me you're at work .)

I didn't mean channel, though, but device. That is, I want stuff that comes in over the USB port, but not stuff that comes from an internal midi/out object.

Read full topic
item.source: Midi in from specific device only

item.title: Midi in from specific device only
item.dc:creator: @jaffasplaffa Mr. Grimm
item.description:
@jaffasplaffa wrote:

Yeah if you make a patch/patcher object, a subpatch and set the midi channel for that subpatch in view>settings menu, then you can set a specific channel for receiving midi in:

Screen Shot 2019-01-04 at 07.46.27.png1145x474 46.2 KB

Read full topic
